game.name: Dump Truck Race
game.description:
Are you the speed game lovers? Does changing the tracks of a four-wheeler at full speed on highways give you the much needed Goosebumps? If yes, opting to play Dump Truck race game online can be a nice bet for you. Your objective in this brand new racing game is to pass all trucks and cars without being collided with other vehicles on the crowded road. Obviously, the task is pretty challenging. But paying attention to the screen and using the arrow keys perfectly will help get through all the obstacles and set your own huge score. 
You will have three lives to lose. So, you will lose your game immediately if your truck hits 3 times. The more vehicles you pass, the better score you will be able to create in this free online race game. You have to be very careful on the road since other vehicles can change their tracks anytime during the gameplay. Try not to hit against them on the track to stay for long in the game! It is all about putting your racing skill to challenge to make your own highscore and be on the top of the leaderbaord. 
The best part about playing this cool html5 race game online is that you do not have to download app to enjoy it in your device. Just browse atmegame.com to access this truck game and beat your boredom from the comfort of any place you are presently in! Our game portal features many other more popular truck race games for free. You can try them out one by one to spot the one that matches your needs and tastes perfectly. Good luck to play best games online, no install required!
